name: infinity (itch) (Edanur)
description:
Play with mouse/trackpad & sound on!!!

Since I was a little kid, the concept is infinity scares me a little bit. It is such an abstract concept, really hard to grasp and full of uncertainty for me. After the Covid-19 has reshaped our lives, I've started to feel both scared and stuck in a place I didn't choose to be. The persisting uncertainty in our current lives made me revisit the tragic story of the acclaimed writer Stefan Zweig and his wife Lotte. And I end up creating this tiny narrative about infinity almost as a healing act. I hope it speaks to you in some way.

Music and sfx: Ayşegül Kuntman
